revision.text:
<languages/> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Pinkan Mountain |image = [[File:Pinkan Mountain.png|thumb]] |caption = An outside view of Pinkan Mountain. |tokens = 86,500 |location = Pinkan Island, between Pinkan Plains and Pinkan Forest. }} '''Pinkan Mountain''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 1,503,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Pinkan Rattata.png|40px]] Pinkan Rattata || colspan=2 rowspan=5|<center> N/A |- | [[File:Pinkan Nidoran(M).png|40px]] Pinkan Nidoran (M) |- | [[File:Pinkan Nidoran(F).png|40px]] Pinkan Nidoran (F) |- | [[File:Pinkan Mankey.png|40px]] Pinkan Mankey |- | [[File:Pinkan Rhyhorn.png|40px]] Pinkan Rhyhorn |- |}
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Pinkan Primeape.png|40px]] Pinkan Primeape || rowspan=3|<center>7,000,000 || rowspan=3 colspan=3 |<center>N/A |- | [[File:Pinkan Rhydon.png|40px]] Pinkan Rhydon |- | [[File:Pinkan Nidoking.png|40px]] Pinkan Nidoking |}
==Items==
===No Debuff=== '''*Note:''' [[Pink Shard]] is a Rare drop in this dungeon. However, due to it needing the player to have reached [[Kalos]] region first, it won't drop without the debuff being applied to it. Check the [[Pinkan Mountain# Debuff Drop Table|Debuff Drop Table]] for more details.
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Pecha}} || 6 || 50.48% || 48.78% || 41.66% |- | {{Bag2|Persim}} || N/A || 8.41% || 8.13% || 6.94% |- | {{Bag2|Nanab}} || N/A || 8.41% || 8.13% || 6.94% |- | {{Bag2|Mago}} || N/A || 8.41% || 8.13% || 6.94% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Purple Shard}} || N/A || 20.22% || 21.32% || 25.98% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Mind Plate}} || N/A || 1.01% || 1.32% || 2.60% |- | {{Bag2|Qualot}} || N/A || 1.01% || 1.32% || 2.60% |- | {{Bag2|Magost}} || N/A || 1.01% || 1.32% || 2.60% |- | {{Bag2|Watmel}} || N/A || 1.01% || 1.32% || 2.60% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Heart Scale}} || N/A || 0.01% || 0.22% || 1.10% |}
===Debuff Drop Table===
After Reaching Kalos, the drop chance for items will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
{| class="wikitable collapsible collapsed" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears !! Requirement |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Pecha}} || 6 || 50.05% || 50.05% || 50.05% || rowspan=4|<center>N/A |- | {{Bag2|Persim}} || N/A || 8.34% || 8.34% || 8.34% |- | {{Bag2|Nanab}} || N/A || 8.34% || 8.34% || 8.34% |- | {{Bag2|Mago}} || N/A || 8.34% || 8.34% || 8.34% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Purple Shard}} || N/A || 12.01% || 12.01% || 12.01% || <center>N/A |- | {{Bag2|Pink Shard}} || N/A || 12.01% || 12.01% || 12.01% || Have reached [[Kalos]] region |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Mind Plate}} || N/A || 0.23% || 0.23% || 0.23% || rowspan=4|<center>N/A |- | {{Bag2|Qualot}} || N/A || 0.23% || 0.23% || 0.23% |- | {{Bag2|Magost}} || N/A || 0.23% || 0.23% || 0.23% |- | {{Bag2|Watmel}} || N/A || 0.23% || 0.23% || 0.23% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Heart Scale}} || N/A || <0.01% || <0.01% || <0.01% || <center>N/A |}
